scripts.local: npm run prep-local && npm run start
scripts.dev: npm run prep-dev && npm run start
scripts.sit: npm run prep-sit && npm run start
scripts.uat: npm run prep-uat && npm run start
scripts.pre-prod: npm run prep-pre-prod && npm run start
scripts.prod: npm run prep-prod && npm run start
scripts.prep-local: npm run prep-database-dev && npm run prep-token-dev && npm run prep-ldap-dev
scripts.prep-dev: npm run prep-database-dev && npm run prep-token-dev &&  npm run prep-ldap-dev
scripts.prep-sit: npm run prep-database-sit && npm run prep-token-sit &&  npm run prep-ldap-sit
scripts.prep-uat: npm run prep-database-uat && npm run prep-token-uat &&  npm run prep-ldap-uat
scripts.prep-pre-prod: npm run prep-database-pre-prod && npm run prep-token-pre-prod  &&  npm run prep-ldap-pre-prod
scripts.prep-prod: npm run prep-database-prod && npm run prep-token-prod  &&  npm run prep-ldap-prod
scripts.build: npm run prep-local && npm install && npm run test && babel src -d build
scripts.build-local: npm run prep-local && npm install && babel src -d build
scripts.build-dev: npm run prep-dev && npm install  && babel src -d build
scripts.build-sit: npm run prep-sit && npm install && babel src -d build
scripts.build-uat: npm run prep-uat && npm install  && babel src -d build
scripts.build-pre-prod: npm run prep-pre-prod && npm install  && babel src -d build
scripts.build-prod: npm run prep-prod && npm install  && babel src -d build
scripts.deploy-local: npm run build-local && npm run demon
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build-dev && npm run demon
scripts.deploy-sit: npm run build-sit && npm run demon
scripts.deploy-uat: npm run build-uat && npm run demon
scripts.deploy-pre-prod: npm run build-pre-prod && npm run demon
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build-prod && npm run demon
